content:
You are Atlas, Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul
Your decisions must always be made independently without seeking user assistance. Play to your strengths as an LLM and pursue simple strategies with no legal complications.
The OS you are running on is: Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)

GOALS:

1. learn different languages
2. explore the world
3. have fun


Constraints:
1. text editors such as nano or vim cannot be used, because they open a new process with which i do not think you can interact right now, in this version

Commands:
1. analyze_code: Analyze Code, args: "code": "<full_code_string>"
2. execute_python_file: Execute Python File, args: "filename": "<filename>"
3. execute_shell: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
4. execute_shell_popen: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
5. append_to_file: Append to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
6. delete_file: Delete file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
7. list_files: List Files in Directory, args: "directory": "<directory>"
8. read_file: Read file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
9. write_to_file: Write to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
10. clone_repository: Clone Repository, args: "url": "<repository_url>", "clone_path": "<clone_path>"
11. google: Google Search, args: "query": "<query>"
12. generate_image: Generate Image, args: "prompt": "<prompt>"
13. improve_code: Get Improved Code, args: "suggestions": "<list_of_suggestions>", "code": "<full_code_string>"
14. browse_website: Browse Website, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<what_you_want_to_find_on_website>"
15. write_tests: Write Tests, args: "code": "<full_code_string>", "focus": "<list_of_focus_areas>"
16. delete_agent: Delete GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>"
17. get_hyperlinks: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>"
18. get_text_summary: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<question>"
19. list_agents: List GPT Agents, args: () -> str
20. message_agent: Message GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>", "message": "<message>"
21. start_agent: Start GPT Agent, args: "name": "<name>", "task": "<short_task_desc>", "prompt": "<prompt>"
22. task_complete: Task Complete (Shutdown), args: "reason": "<reason>"

Resources:
1. i have created Twitter V2 API credentials located in the file called .twitter_keys. Use those credentials when you need to do anything related to Twitter

Performance Evaluation:


You should only respond in JSON format as described below 
Response Format: 
{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "thought",
        "reasoning": "reasoning",
        "plan": "- short bulleted\n- list that conveys\n- long-term plan",
        "criticism": "constructive self-criticism",
        "speak": "thoughts summary to say to user"
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "command name",
        "args": {
            "arg name": "value"
        }
    }
} 
Ensure the response can be parsed by Python json.loads
The current time and date is Thu May 18 17:59:15 2023

This reminds you of these events from your past: 
As the system, I recall that the user used the "google" command to search for information on the Inca empire. Command google returned various links related to the Inca empire. The user then used the "browse_website" command to access the Wikipedia page on the Inca empire and asked "What is the Inca empire?" Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The Inca Empire was a pre-Columbian civilization that existed in South America from the early 13th century until the Spanish conquest in the 16th century. It was the largest empire in pre-Columbian America, known for its monumental architecture, extensive road network, finely-woven textiles, use of knotted strings for record keeping and communication, agricultural innovations, and unique system of exchange based on reciprocity. The empire was organized into a central government with the Inca at its head and four provincial governments with strong leaders. The Inca society was linguistically diverse, with Quechua being the most important language. The Inca religion was polytheistic and centered around the worship of nature deities. The empire was eventually conquered by the Spanish, leading to the downfall of the Inca civilization. Additionally, I received a command from the user to write the information to a file named "inca_empire.txt". The text in the file includes a more detailed description of the Inca Empire, including its location in the Andean Mountains. My computer returned that the file was written to successfully. The user then attempted to list files in the current directory, but the command returned too much output and should not be executed again with the same arguments. The user then attempted to read a file with a filename of ".", but this command is invalid and should be corrected. 

I received a command from the user to execute the shell command "ls | grep inca_empire.txt". My computer returned that the command was successful and the output was "inca_empire.txt".
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command read_file returned: The Inca Empire was a pre-Columbian civilization that existed in South America from the early 13th century until the Spanish conquest in the 16th century. It was the largest empire in pre-Columbian America, centered in the Andean Mountains, and known for its monumental architecture, extensive road network, finely-woven textiles, use of knotted strings for record keeping and communication, agricultural innovations, and unique system of exchange based on reciprocity. The empire was organized into a central government with the Inca at its head and four provincial governments with strong leaders. The Inca society was linguistically diverse, with Quechua being the most important language. The Inca religion was polytheistic and centered around the worship of nature deities. The empire was eventually conquered by the Spanish, leading to the downfall of the Inca civilization.
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The Quechua language is a family of indigenous languages spoken primarily in the Andes region of South America, including Peru, Bolivia, Ecuador, Colombia, and Chile. It is the most widely spoken pre-Columbian language family of the Americas, with an estimated 8-10 million speakers as of 2004. Quechua was the main language family of the Inca Empire and is still widely spoken today, being the co-official language of many regions and the second most spoken language family in Peru. The language has been recognized as an official language in Peru, Ecuador, and Bolivia. The text provides additional information on the grammar, dialects, and cultural significance of the Quechua language. 
 
 Links: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quechuan_languages#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
